venue.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve, just past

item.description:
Easy Hike & or Drinks & Food

Monday Feb., 20th. hike at 1 pm. to 3 pm.

Drinks and food at 3 pm. to 5 pm.

Horse Hill Nature Preserve

184 Amherst rd.

Merrimack NH. 03054

www.hhno.org. 

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

A Child & Dog friendly event.

THIS WILL BE a RAIN, SNOW, or SHINE EVENT.

Steve O1b. wrote:

         Please join me and my friends for what I hope is a pleasant day for hiking. Bring the dogs, kids and your friends. If it does rain? It will be a shorter hike. We will hike for and easy 2 to 2 1/2 hours. We will be stopping and smell what's left of the roses, not on a race.  After the hike, I plan to go to the Conman Man restaurant to put back some of those calories we walked off.                    This preserve is an area of 563 acres wooded and wetlands. There is parking and well marked trails. The trails loop around to make for an interesting hike. This is an easy safe setting. Where you can come and go at anytime.  If the parking area is full. Park on the road. But, make sure your wheels are over the white line. Please check out the web site and download your trail map. If you wish?
item.name: Easy Hike & or Drinks & Food
